item.name: Rapier
item.desc: Effective against horseback and armoured units

item.name: Runesword
item.desc: Uses MAG to determine damage. Drains HP from enemy

item.name: Wind Sword
item.desc: Uses MAG to determine damage. Effective against fliers

item.name: Reginleif
item.desc: Effective against horseback and armoured units

item.name: Swordslayer
item.desc: Reverses the weapon triangle. Effective against sword fighters

item.name: Fortify
item.desc: Restores (User's Magic + 10) HP to all allies within range.

item.name: Restore
item.target_restrict: any(status.negative and status.time for status in target.status_effects)

item.name: Berserk
item.desc: Enrages an enemy, causing them to attack without regard for allies

item.name: Hammerne
item.desc: Repairs a weapon or staff to full uses

item.name: Latona
item.desc: Restores HP and condition of all allied units

item.name: Nosferatu
item.desc: Recover HP equal to damage dealth

item.name: Pure Water
item.desc: A draught that boosts the user's RES.

item.name: Angelic Robe
item.desc: Permanently raises maximum HP by 7 points.

item.name: Metis's Tome
item.desc: Permanently raises all of the user's growth rates by 5.
